name: Rapid Theft
description:
This game was made within a short time span because I started a day late on the 19th Score Space Jam, but I do think it turned out alright for my first public game! I hope you enjoy!

https://itch.io/embed-upload/5928528?color=333333 - Link For Embed Game

If the game does well I may add levels and fix bugs if any are found.

Pre-Made Assets: Base Player Sprite - https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-3-character-sprite-pixel-art
